code:
---
config:
  theme: redux-color
  look: neo
---

sequenceDiagram
        actor User as User
        participant WebUI as WebUI
        participant Server as Server
        participant Database as Database
        User->>+WebUI:Add product to cart
        WebUI->>+Server: UPDATE / cart{}
        Server->>+Database: Check stock

        opt Product out of stock
            Database-->> Server: Return product stock
            Server -->> WebUI:Product out of stock
            WebUI -->> User: Display out of stock message
        end
        
        
        Database-->>-Server: Return updated cart
        Server-->>-WebUI: 200 / {meta, list of product}
        WebUI->>-WebUI: Display updated product cart
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在WebUI、Server完成整个流程。
